trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of the progress report value.
trans-unit.target: 指定進度報表值的型別。

trans-unit.source: Provides an <see cref="T:System.IProgress`1" /> that invokes callbacks for each reported progress value.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.IProgress`1" />，會針對每個報告進度值叫用回呼。

trans-unit.source: Any handler provided to the constructor or event handlers registered with the <xref:System.Progress%601.ProgressChanged> event are invoked through a <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> instance captured when the instance is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 提供給建構函式或事件處理常式的任何處理常式註冊為<xref:System.Progress%601.ProgressChanged>事件會透過叫用<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>建構執行個體時，擷取執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If there is no current <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> at the time of construction, the callbacks will be invoked on the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有目前<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>建構時，回呼將會叫用<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>。

trans-unit.source: For more information and a code example, see the article [Async in 4.5: Enabling Progress and Cancellation in Async APIs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=267243) in the .NET Framework blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱文章[4.5 中的非同步： 啟用進度和非同步 Api 中的取消](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=267243)in the.NET Framework 部落格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> object or initializes the <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> object with the specified callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> 物件或使用指定的回呼初始化 <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A handler to invoke for each reported progress value.
trans-unit.target: 要針對每個報告進度值叫用的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This handler will be invoked in addition to any delegates registered with the <see cref="E:System.Progress`1.ProgressChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 除了以<see cref="E:System.Progress`1.ProgressChanged" />事件註冊的所有委派，還會叫用這個處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> instance captured by the <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> at construction, it is possible that this handler instance could be invoked concurrently with itself.
trans-unit.target: 視 <see cref="T:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext" /> 在建構上擷取的 <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> 執行個體而定，或許可以同時一起叫用這個處理常式執行個體與該處理常式本身。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> object with the specified callback.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的回呼初始化 <see cref="T:System.Progress`1" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the updated progress.
Raised for each reported progress value.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個報告的進度值引發。

trans-unit.source: Handlers registered with this event will be invoked on the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> captured when the instance was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 與這個事件註冊處理常式將會叫用<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>擷取建構的執行個體時。

trans-unit.source: The value of the updated progress.
